title: When you are retreating with <5% of your health yet, but you don't know if Teemo shroomed that bush

replies.body:
[http://i.imgur.com/ZcgW3HL.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ZcgW3HL.jpg)
{{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}}

http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view3/1359100/oh-man-oh-god-o.gif

oh man oh god

I had an insane blast playing these games and somehow, especially when I played Teemo jungle, there wasn't much hate going on. People were like "Holy sh** this actually works!...it scares and amazes me at the same time.". :D
Well...and then I faced super-salty Riven {{champion:17}}
Yeah, but it's a lil bit boring sometimes. With jungle teemo you can spread shrooms and toxic toxicity all over the map all day long! {{champion:17}}
You won against a Riven? Nicely done, it's a hard match-up. As a salt-less (Except against Malzahar) Riven main I can say being beat my Teemo is pretty rare.

She was pretty scared of me after I killed her once (with Udyr's help) and after I forced her to go back to base again as she came back. From there on she'd desperately try to lasthit, but show no aggression whatsoever. If she would have tried she would have most likely killed me or at least force me out of my lane. She missed this window of opportunity and since Udyr was ganking all the other lanes as well we won this game pretty fast.
https://33.media.tumblr.com/761e20abdb9e468c3accfb3603720562/tumblr_inline_o14zpv3jWx1sm3ibk_500.gif
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1mFCoQa_0yw/hqdefault.jpg

But... What if they have 5000 HP and 300 MR?

Like a {{champion:33}} for Teemo

Apply to Anti-devil association today!

{{champion:3}} you rang? 
https://49.media.tumblr.com/0fa0ad455733c7a87cdaa36c2a879e5e/tumblr_nm763ewavX1tvo2c3o1_500.gif

That mysterious liquid is he holding?

https://media.giphy.com/media/dp74BKs7XV7Ve/giphy.gif
It's an ancient artifact called mana potion! When the old people sit by the fire they talk about it as they would talk about their comrads fallen on the Fields of Justice!
And thus, will become just a legend, and the seasons pass.  An item that seemed to good to be true, and it will be but a bedtime story.
I think it's a Madreds Bloodrazor

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pEaqr06H,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-03T20:17:43.583+0000)
>
> {{champion:3}} you rang? 
> https://49.media.tumblr.com/0fa0ad455733c7a87cdaa36c2a879e5e/tumblr_nm763ewavX1tvo2c3o1_500.gif

IT'S BEAUTIFUL
Red Smite + Red buff + liandry's + void staff + sorcerer boots + abyssal + so freaking fast even you won't catch me if I plan my ride {{champion:35}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:35}}
If you're still on your side of the map, just walk back to base. It might take longer, but it'll be safer.

510 movementspeed teemo is still following you and he becomes faster while staring at you in his madness! 
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=https%3A%2F%2Fi.ytimg.com%2Fvi%2F1mFCoQa_0yw%2Fhqdefault.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150
Then you remember you're Sivir and you have boots of swiftness and have your ult up.
Nooooo, *activates* W for more movespeed. Don't you dare getting away! {{item:1311}} {{item:1414}}
You're not getting me! *flashes into base behind mid inhib turret*
GG WP dude^^
don't stop there, yesterday you said tomorrow, so just do it, dive the nexus for it.
Come to my fountain! It'll be a blast :D
I sure hope Teemo shroomed this bush, I could use the heal {{champion:3}} {{item:3065}}

I love waiting until they recall in the bush that I am in, as a fellow {{champion:17}} main, Although, I do like the work of my fellow shrooms.

https://media.giphy.com/media/lXiRmOGtGZaavKw9i/giphy.gif
Looks more like {{champion:75}} Q'ed the ADC with 900 stacks.
or maybe Teemo with 9000 ap

But suddenly...
http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/3-14-2015/LzHswn.gif

hahahaa xD. Thats why i dont retreat if theres no real reason to. but if i do have to i wont go in bushes. its a given not to wander around every bush you can if theres a teemo. if theres no immediate danger, go somewhere low profile and b there, no need to freak out and go to bushes.
